result.execSummary:
The defendant Adam R Zimmerman was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Adam R Zimmerman is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Adam R Zimmerman was found guilty of Possess w/Intent-Heroin(>3-10g), a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(d)2.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Submit to DNA sample.  Submit to random drug testing.    If probation/extended supervision revoked or discharges with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  ALL COURT ORDERED OBLIGATIONS TO BE PAID THROUGH CLERK OF COURTS

timeConds.notes: With Huber privileges.  Jail to commence on or before July 22, 2016, unless agent states sooner.

records.descr: Amended Judgment of Conviction After Revocation

records.addlTxt: 400 days sentence credit to be applied

Defendant Adam R Zimmerman in court with attorney John Andrew Newton.  Defendant Adam R Zimmerman in custody.  Dennis Joseph Ryan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states case and parties state appearances.  Atty Newton states there is a joint recommendation.  Parties rec/rev revocation summary and letter filed by agent Moore.  Atty Newton states the joint agreement and notes parties will file stipulation re: credit w/in the next day or two.  State is in agreement.  DE's mother makes a statement to the Court.  State makes statement.  Atty Newton makes statement.  DE makes statement.  Court admonishes DE and sentences.  DE advised again re: voting rights and felony firearms warnings.  WEDS form reviewed briefly, copy to the DE.

Ct 1:  Probation revoked
4 years 6 months prison (2 1/2 years Initial Confinement and 2 years Extended Supervision)
Consecutive to any other sentence DE may be serving to commence FORTHWITH
Conditions of extended supervision:
Not to possess/consume any controlled substances w/o valid prescription and then only if used accordingly
Absolute sobriety at all times from alcohol and controlled substances
AODA and any other treatment per agent
DE is eligible for CIP and SAP
Sentence credit to be determined in writing
Character Letters
Sentencing hearing on revocation on June 25, 2018 at 11:00 am.
Sentencing hearing on revocation on June 25, 2018 at 11:00 am.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Adam R Zimmerman in court with attorney Andrew I. Martinez.  Dennis Joseph Ryan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea to Count 1.  Dismiss Count 2.  State recommendation.  Attorney Martinez agrees.  No Contest Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court finds Defendant guilty.  State gives final argument.  Attorney Martinez gives final statement.  Court withholds sentence.
Count 1:
3 years Probation
60 days Sauk County Jail, with huber privileges.  Jail to commence on or before July 22, 2016 at 6 p.m., unless agent directs sooner.
DNA surcharge $250/sample
Undergo any counseling per agent
AODA & treatment
Submit to random drug testing
$908.00 Fine/Costs fees (PAID THRU CLERK OF COURTS) 
Cash bond to apply.
Count 2: Dismissed.
Paperwork handed in court.
Felony admonishments.
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 24, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial on May 23, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Cover Letter from ADA Ryan
Jury trial at 05-24-2016 08:30 am
Final pre-trial at 05-16-2016 01:00 pm

Defendant Adam R Zimmerman in court with attorney Andrew I. Martinez.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty. Martinez and ADA Ryan just received discovery from RPD.  Court will leave on calendar until Br. 3 removes it.  Bond continues.
Jury trial at 02-16-2016 08:30 am
Final pre-trial at 02-08-2016 01:00 pm

Defendant Adam R Zimmerman in court with attorney Andrew I. Martinez.  Dennis Joseph Ryan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Rec'd copy of INFO/waived reading.  Court goes through information charges with defendant.    Stands Mute, Court enters Not Guilty Plea, set for trial
Arraignment at 11-20-2015 01:00 pm.

Defendant Adam R Zimmerman in court with attorney Andrew I. Martinez.  Michael Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states case and parties state appearances.  Court questions DE on waiver of prelim.  Court accepts prelim waiver/finds probable cause and binds over.
Preliminary hearing at 10-16-2015 10:15 am

Defendant Adam R Zimmerman in court with attorney Andrew I. Martinez.  Dennis Joseph Ryan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Martinez advises matter is not resolved.  Request preliminary hearing.  Time limits waived.  Bond continues.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 16, 2015 at 10:15 am.
& witness list

Pre-trial conference at 09-04-2015 11:00 am.
Return date at 09-15-2015 01:00 pm.

Defendant Adam R Zimmerman appeared by video means from LEC w/atty. Middleton. Prosecuting Atty Sue Mueller appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  State requests $2000 Cash bond.  Atty. Middleton argues for Signature bond and no objection to conditions.  Advised rights to an attorney.  Requests Preliminary hearing; Time limits waived.  Court sets $2000.00 Cash bond.  Special bond conditions as follows: No contact w/M.A.; No possession of controlled substances or paraphernalia.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 4, 2015 at 11:00 am.  Return date scheduled for September 15, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
